Detailed Description

This class encapsulates the leader/available-status of a module.

The purpose of having this status in its own class rather than as a simple member of Reader is twofold:

1. Someone might need to know if the module is leader but shouldn't be tightly coupled to the Reader class. 2. Since knowing the status can be helpful in other threads than the Reader thread, it must be protected by a mutex, this is done here.
